summary: The diff shows only a modification to project_state.json, which tracks existing features but does not constitute deployment changes. REQ-15 requires deploying the application to Internet Computer mainnet with all acceptance criteria verified in production. No deployment configuration, build artifacts, canister deployment files, or production URLs are evident in the diff.
